full_summary:
=====================================

**Office Furniture – Passport Office Surrey**
=====================================

### Solicitation Number

* Solicitation Number: WS4007203206
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: October 31, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 27, 2023, 2:00 PM PT

### Project Summary

Public Services and Procurement Canada, Real Property Branch on behalf of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is soliciting bids for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture at Passport Office 15330 54a Ave. Surrey, BC V3S 8R7.

### General Information

* Scope of Work: Purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: February 5, 2025
* Trade Agreements: None
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

### Procurement Information

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Limited Tendering Reason: None

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Point of Contact

* Name: Mikulova, Kristina (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kristina.mikulova@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: None
* Fax: None

### Additional Information

* Tender Description: Please see the tender description for complete details.
* Notice URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17876803?extsite=MTc4NzY4MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Note: I have only included the most important information regarding the tender. However, I suggest that you review the original text for any missing details. Also, I have kept it concise and to the point as per the 400-word limit. I have also reformatted the text to make it more readable.
